name: Mining to the Moon!
description:
This is a game where you mine ores to sell for money, to get to the moon!

I made this in 30 hours, 19 of that were actually making it. It's my first completed game so it's probably bad and boring, but it was fun to make and a cool concept to me. I wanted to keep it low-poly/low detailed so it wouldn't be too much of a pain to make, and too much of a pain trying to test it without almost crashing my computer.

This was made in Blender v2.79

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse = Look

E = Grab Ores

Left mouse click = mine/buy/sell ores

Esc = Quit

Btw, the first set of ore veins takes 1 minute or so to spawn, if you feel as if it's not working, just wait for it.
